comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Antonio Scotti (25 January 1866 – 26 February 1936) was an Italian baritone. He was a principal artist of the New York Metropolitan Opera for more than 33 seasons, but also sang with great success at London's Royal Opera House, Covent Garden, and Milan's La Scala." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antonio_Scotti

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B-59:  Thank you again for the additional information.  We'll include some of it next time we update.
